Translations.Text: Mi Iiief Oebbi laaqed n lambiyya: "s tidep, Fki$ awen si Tezmamt akw si uuwab, sinna, iusa kwen id umazan, i itebbten ayen illan $uowen. Amnet yis, aiwnet ep". Inna: "taazmem u tqeblem, f waya, laaqed iW"? Nnan as: "naazem". Inna: "ihi, cehhdet, Nek, yidwen, seg inagan
Wid iwexxoen, deffir waya, nitni d iballa$en
Day b$an ddin ur nelli n Oebbi? U Neppa, unzen aS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan, b$an ne$ ugin. Â£uoeS, tu$alin nnsen

Ini: "numen s Oebbi, akked wayen id irsen $uone$, akked wayen id irsen ar Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq, Iaaqub, laaoac, ayen ippunefken i Musa, Aisa, akked lambiyya, s$uo Mass nnsen. Ur nesmenyaf yiwen degsen. Nekwni nunez aS
Win ib$an ddin, war annuz, ur ipwaqbal s$uoes. U neppa, di laxert, seg imexsuoen
Amek ara Inhu Oebbi agdud inekoen deffir liman is, u cehhden ar Amazan d tidep, u iusa ten id ubeggen? Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Widak, aqeiii nnsen d ddell s$uo Oebbi, d lmalayek, akked imdanen meooa
Degs ad wekkoen; ur ippifsus fellasen uaaqeb, ur stiseren
Kkes ed wid iu$alen nedmen, deffir waya, u xedmen ayen ilhan. Ih, Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ih, wid ijehlen, deffir liman nnsen, sinna, rnan di tijehli, ur tepwaqbal nndama nnsen. Widak d im$eooqen
Ih, wid ijehlen, u mmuten d ijehliyen, ur ipwaqbal s$uo yiwen degsen, azal n tmurt n ddheb, a t id ifdu. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean, ur sain amaiwen
